text: Lukáš Chalupa (born December 28, 1993) is a Czech professional ice hockey player. He is currently playing for SK Horácká Slavia Třebíč of the Chance Liga. Chalupa has previously played in the Czech Extraliga for HC Slavia Praha, HC Plzeň and Piráti Chomutov. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:HC Berounští Medvědi players Category:Czech ice hockey defencemen Category:Stoczniowiec Gdańsk players Category:HC Kobra Praha players Category:Piráti Chomutov players Category:HC Plzeň players Category:Rytíři Kladno players Category:HC Slavia Praha players Category:SK Horácká Slavia Třebíč players Category:HC Slovan Ústečtí Lvi players Category:Sportovní Klub Kadaň players Category:HC Stadion Litoměřice players Category:People from Chomutov District
title: Lukáš Chalupa
